artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude delint. / No. 62 | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Pub. Decr. 1. 1810, Boydell & Co. No. 90 Cheapside London. / From the Original Drawing in the Collection of Edmund Turner Esqr. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. Earlom sculpt.
portfolio: From Plate 62 from Liber Veritatis, vol. 3 (London, 1819)
title: Landscape with Peasants Dancing
